```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
yale_df <- read.csv("property_directory.csv") %>% as_tibble
full_df <- readRDS("full_df.RDS")
```
```{r}
yale_df$address <- 
  yale_df$address %>% 
  str_remove(", New Haven, CT") %>% 
  toupper() %>% 
  str_trim()
```

```{r}
yale_full <- full_df %>% dplyr::filter(grepl("YALE", owner))

yale_full %>% left_join(yale_df)
```
